meanings.sent1: The cuneal piece of cheese was perfect for snacking.
meanings.sent2: The doorstop had a cuneal design to keep the door open.
meanings.sent3: The cuneal slice of cake made everyone smile at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was cuneal, spreading from ear to ear.
meanings.sent5: The cuneal mountain peak stood tall against the blue sky.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a wedge.
meanings.sent1: The cuneal tool was used to cut the wood into perfect shapes.
meanings.sent2: The cuneal formation of the rocks indicated a geological shift.
meanings.sent3: The cuneal pattern on the fabric caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent4: His words had a cuneal effect on her decision-making process.
meanings.sent5: The cuneal shadow cast by the tree provided a cool spot to rest.
